entry.p: On the current protests in France, here is political commentator Alain Duhamel (as quoted in the New York Times):

blockquote.p: The majority of the French are passionate in their distrust of market forces and in their refusal to embrace flexibility.

entry.p: No Anglosphere social model for the French, it seems! I'm sure The Dissident Frogman would have some piquant words to share if he were blogging more often...
